tool.name: SAGA.ta_profiles.3
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayDEM False isArrayLINES False output_data_PROFILES $output_data_PROFILES name SAGA.ta_profiles.3 DEM $DEM LINES $LINES DIST_LINE $DIST_LINE DIST_PROFILE $DIST_PROFILE NUM_PROFILE $NUM_PROFILE prefer $prefer response $response outputType_PROFILES $OutputSection_PROFILES.outputType_PROFILES transmissionMode_PROFILES $OutputSection_PROFILES.transmissionMode_PROFILES

param.name: DEM
param.label: DEM
param.help: DEM The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, x-ogc-envi, png, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: LINES
param.label: Lines
param.help: Lines The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, xml

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_PROFILES
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_PROFILES
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Create cross profiles from a grid based DEM for given lines.<br/>
